response.message: Holly Shania Twain! This is great! Can't wait to do some really fun stuff with this!

Yiack... ohh my eyes... 


Jeff, could you PLEASE change the "Page Not Found" page for stackapps.com? ...  I mean, c'mon, Sean Connery on Zardoz suit is should be tagged as NSFW at least!!

Very cool guys! keep up the good work and keep those content scraping spammers off your api!

I've already seen a few of them ranking higher than stack overflow in google :(
Hooray! I have been looking forward to this day. I have already submitted 3 apps and a wrapper, so there are things for people to try out that demonstrate the API.

Jeff I'm loving the style (and rounded corners). It reminds me of my meta request! 

http://meta.stackoverflow.com/questions/39396/stack-overflow-2-0
I am awaiting a sweet webOS app... made by someone other than me.
Joe, I don't know what you mean by webOS. But if you're looking for a lightweight front-end, try my site: http://m.stackoverflow.quickmediasolutions.com/
Oh THAT webOS. I thought you meant something like eyeOS. Are the development tools for webOS free? Maybe I could make something if they are... no guarentees though.
